description:
Guess what, Disney fans? Frozen is good. And as you may have heard, the soundtrack is even better.迪斯尼的粉丝们，你们怎么看？《冰雪奇缘》很不错。也许和你听说的那样，它的电影原声甚至比电影更棒。

Like the now-classics in Disney’s Renaissance period, Frozen’s array of original tunes feels as fresh and infectious as the Menken-Ashman-Rice songs that defined a generation’s Disney musicals.与迪斯尼动画复兴时期的经典作品一样，《冰雪奇缘》的原创音乐听起来很有新鲜感，朗朗上口，正如孟肯、阿什曼、莱斯这些杰出的音乐家所创作出的、标榜着一个时代的迪斯尼音乐一样。

Now the movie is out (and cleaning up at the box office) and the soundtrack is ready for streaming, and I just can’t stop listening. Here’s my ranking of the original songs by Bobby Lopez and Kristen Anderson-Lopez. (Although, let’s be frank: They’re all pretty fantastic.)现在电影已经上映（并占据票房首位），它的原声带也已经流出，我反复地听这些曲目，根本停不下来。这里是我个人对原声带歌曲做的一个排行，这些歌曲是由鲍比·洛佩兹和克里斯汀·安德森洛佩兹创作的。（不过老实说：所有的歌曲都特别棒。）

9. “Frozen Heart”9. 《冻结的心》

The movie’s opening number features a chorale of harmonizing ice harvesters (obviously the best kind of ice harvesters) singing about how much they love chopping up ice. We never see or hear from these hefty fellas again, and because the song is basically a giant warning about the dangers of frozen things.电影的开场曲目是采冰人的合唱的赞歌（显然是善良派的采冰人），表达了对采冰的热爱。之后这些高大健壮的小伙子就再也没有出现，我们也听不到他们的歌声了，因为这首歌基本上是在警告冻结的事物是十分危险的。
